external_games.name: Caverns of the Snow Witch (Fighting Fantasy Classics)

name: Fighting Fantasy Classics: Caverns of the Snow Witch
summary: Deep within the Crystal Caves of the Icefinger Mountains, the dreaded Snow Witch is plotting to bring on a new ice age. A brave trapper dies in your arms and lays the burden of his mission on your shoulders But time is running out – will YOU take up the challenge?
